message: Amazed at how fast the videos are going up. Wondering why we chose blip.tv for the hosting though. Can't even find a way to search their site from my iPad. Why not Vimeo or YouTube?
@JeffSelf blip.tv provide download link, and I think PyCon will provide blip link too. then search PyCon schedule page should work too, isn't it?
I couldn't find the obfuscation talk, I wanted to show my cousin.
When are the slides coming up?
monitor videos as they go up by following @ThePSF on twitter (you can filter on PyCon 2011);  you can search what's been uploaded from http://pycon.blip.tv/posts
